movies.title: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
movies.description: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

actors.name: Natsuki Hanae
actors.description: Natsuki Hanae is known for his work on Starmyu (2015), Aldnoah.Zero (2014) and Demon Slayer: Mugen Train (2020).

actors.name: Akari Kitô
actors.description: Akari Kitô was born on October 16, 1994 in Nagoya, Japan. She is known for her work on Demon Slayer: Mugen Train (2020), Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba (2019) and Sword Art Online (2012).

actors.name: Tim Robbins
actors.description: Born in West Covina, California, but raised in New York City, Tim Robbins is the son of former The Highwaymen singer Gil Robbins and actress Mary Robbins (née Bledsoe). Robbins studied drama at UCLA, where he graduated with honors in 1981.

actors.name: Morgan Freeman
actors.description: With an authoritative voice and calm demeanor, this ever popular American actor has grown into one of the most respected figures in modern US cinema. Morgan was born on June 1, 1937 in Memphis, Tennessee, to Mayme Edna (Revere), a teacher, and Morgan Porterfield Freeman, a barber.s
